title: "Sprout D"
marks: Signature and Marks LRC, in pencil: [Toko Shinoda]; LRC, in pencil: [S
description: four wispy linear forms rising vertically up the center of image from between two square figures at bottom; LL square is black, LR figure is lighter, transparent; at center, a transparent rectangular form crosses the wispy figures
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Gene Perrine
